value.name: Witness Chases Drive-By Shooting Suspects In Woodland; 3 Arrested With Help From Public
value.description: Three suspects in a Woodland drive-by shooting that injured one person were arrested with help from community members and a witness who drove after them, police said on Sunday.

video.name: Witness Chases Drive-By Shooting Suspects In Woodland; 3 Arrested With Help From Public

value.name: 3 arrested, including 14-year-old, for attempted murder in Woodland
value.description: Police say a drive-by shooter near Woodland Senior High School was caught after a witness chased them down and rammed their car.

value.name: Three arrested after shooting at a Woodland home
value.description: Two men and one juvenile were arrested after shooting at a Woodland residence Saturday night. The incident occurred around 9:15 p.m. when the occupants of the vehicle shot at a home in the 100 block of W.

value.name: 2 men, teen face attempted murder charges after Woodland shooting
value.description: Three people, including a teen, were arrested on attempted murder charges after a shooting near a high school led to another shooting and crash in different parts of a Woodland neighborhood, officials said Sunday.

value.name: Ceres parents left with questions following arrest of 15-year-old special needs boy
value.description: I am saddened because my son was treated like a criminal,” Sonia Ruiz said about her boy, who has cerebral palsy.

value.name: Police reports
value.description: Raul Javier Lopez Romero, 21, of Marion County was charged near the intersection of I Street and Third Street for possession of forged instruments, driving with a suspended license, failure to appear in court and giving false information to a police officer.
